mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 - March 14, 2022:
- Depart from Manhattan to Texarkana by self-driving (duration: 20 hours 36 mins, distance: 2,218 km, cost: $110).
- Arrive in Texarkana and check into a private home on Airbnb that allows parties. Here are some options within your budget:
  1. "Elegant & Modern Luxury Home Near Downtown" - Entire home/apt, 3 bedrooms, 3 beds, 2 baths, $249 per night, $747 for 3 nights (https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/518610883345261873).
  2. "Spacious & Cozy Home with Hot Tub and Fire Pit" - Entire home/apt, 4 bedrooms, 5 beds, 2.5 baths, $299 per night, $897 for 3 nights (https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/510616436543723447).
  
Total accommodation cost: ~$800.

Day 2 - March 15, 2022:
- Explore the sights and attractions in Texarkana such as the Perot Museum of Nature and Science, Texas State Line, Arkansas State Line, and the Historic Downtown Square.

Day 3 - March 16, 2022:
- Depart from Texarkana to Dallas by self-driving (duration: 2 hours 43 mins, distance: 289 km, cost: $14).
- Check into a private home on Airbnb that allows parties. Here are some options within your budget:
  1. "Luxurious Modern Oasis in the Heart of Dallas" - Entire home/apt, 3 bedrooms, 3 beds, 2.5 baths, $275 per night, $825 for 3 nights (https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/479643014565773001).
  2. "Stunning & Spacious Home with Pool and Game Room" - Entire home/apt, 5 bedrooms, 6 beds, 3 baths, $329 per night, $987 for 3 nights (https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/494108776614643802).
  
Total accommodation cost: ~$900.

Day 4 - March 17, 2022:
- Spend the day exploring Dallas's top attractions such as The Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza, Reunion Tower, and the Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Garden.

Day 5 - March 18, 2022:
- Depart from Dallas to Manhattan by flight (duration: 1 hour 31 minutes, distance: 431 km, cost: $121).
- Arrive at LaGuardia Airport and take a taxi back home (cost: ~$55, duration: 30 mins).

Total transportation cost: ~$390.

Summary:
- Accommodation cost: ~$1,700.
- Transportation cost: ~$610.
- Dallas and Texarkana sightseeing costs (attractions, food, and entertainment): ~$1,590 remaining within your budget of $3,900.
